sections.instructor: Cole Ekberg, Marci, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent. NOTE: Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-170 should not enroll in BIOSC-171. Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-170 will not receive credit for BIOSC-171. Class field trips will be organized to local sites related to course topics. Note: Partially online course with required lab meetings Wednesday 9:35AM- 12:35 PM (on-campus lab, see room on schedule) with all other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.
